Name: MidiBard 2 - Preview
Punchline:
[BETA] Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Description:
[WARNING] This is the preview build of MidiBard 2, it's mostly stable but you may still experience bugs/crashes.
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
- HSCM controller support
- Solo and ensemble mode support
- Text commands for instrument equip and switch
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
